text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
You sure went all out for training<n>today! And Trainer too—you
both really<n>packed a punch!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
Yes, I think Trainer wants the same<n>thing I do—to see just
how high I can<n>soar.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
But I'm sure the upcoming<n>Takarazuka Kinen also has
something<n>to do with it.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Air Groove is running in it too, right?!<n>Finally, a head-to-head
battle with<n>your rival! As always, I'll be there to<n>cheer you
on!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Ah, right! Suzuka, let me give you<n>another massage today.
We wouldn't<n>want any sore muscles slowing you<n>down!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Wooow! Suzuka, your leg musclesare so tight! Like, mega tight! Ireally need to loosen you up!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: No matter how much I run, I feel like I<n>can still go farther...

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
When I'm running, I feel like there's<n>someone there,
pushing me to run<n>even faster, to go even farther...

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
Maybe it's because you, our trainer,<n>and everyone else on
Team Sirius has<n>been so supportive.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Ehehe, and we'll keep being<n>supportive! All you have to do
is show<n>us more of your amazing running!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
And to show you I mean it, I'll<n>massage your legs till they
turn to<n>jelly! I'll show you what milking<n>cows does for
your hand muscles!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: C-cows?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Even after her jaw-dropping<n>performance at the Kinko Sho,
Silence<n>Suzuka surprises us all by continuing<n>to improve.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Eager to help her give a spectacular<n>performance at the
Takarazuka Kinen,<n>I head over to the training track.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Rustle...

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: (H-huh? Wh-when did it get so dark?)

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: (H-huh? Wh-when did it get so dark?)
Heave-ho, heave-ho.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: (A-am I being carried? What's going<n>on?!)
Welcome, my dear trainer, to my<n>laboratory.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: L-laboratory?! Who are you?!

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: L-laboratory?! Who are you?!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
I am Agnes Tachyon, and I brought<n>you here to have a word
with you.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
A wry smile adorns the<n>Umamusume's expression. Looking<n>
down at her feet, I see a burlap sack.<n>Did she just kidnap
me?!
choice_data_list: What do you want with me, creep?!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
A wry smile adorns the<n>Umamusume's expression. Looking<n>
down at her feet, I see a burlap sack.<n>Did she just kidnap
me?!
choice_data_list: What do you want with me, creep?!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
"Creep" is going a little too far, don't<n>you think? I may have
been a tad<n>rough, but I brought you here with<n>good intent.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
You see, I want to talk. Specifically, I<n>want to talk about your
trainee, Silence<n>Suzuka.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: That's all?

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: That's all?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
Yes... By the way, have you ever<n>thought about how
enigmatic we<n>Umamusume are?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
Our anatomy is practically identical to<n>humans, yet our
physical prowess far<n>exceeds that of man.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
We Umamusume are full of such<n>mysteries... and well,
solving those<n>mysteries is the focus of my<n>research.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: ...What does that have to do with my<n>trainee?

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: ...What does that have to do with my<n>trainee?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
Imagine, running a race accelerating<n>the whole time. Even I
have to admit...<n>your aspirations intrigue me!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
If she can master that running style of<n>hers, it could take us
Umamusume to<n>the next level—nay, a whole new<n>world!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: I want to know what training methodsyou're implementing as you explorethis uncharted territory. That iswhy I brought you here.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
...Interesting. Are you sure you're not<n>doing anything out of
the ordinary?

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, just plain ol' training and rest. I<n>don't want to
overwork her, after all.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
If your training is not the cause of<n>such super-Uma speed,
then perhaps<n>Suzuka's innate physical capabilities<n>are
just that spectacular...

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
No, it's just as likely to be something<n>psychological.
Perhaps it's<n>manifesting physically as a perceived<n>
increase in strength.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: Something psychological? What are<n>you talking about?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
Surely you've heard it before. We<n>Umamusume are said to
run carrying<n>the hopes and dreams of others.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
You've seen the Three Goddesses<n>statue in the plaza, yes?
The legend<n>there also describes Umamusume as<n>beings
who carry the wills of others.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
As a researcher, I tend to dismiss<n>such talk as romanticism,
but... I am<n>also an Umamusume.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
Sometimes when I run, I can feel it. I<n>can feel someone
pushing me<n>forward.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
She must be referring to the fans of<n>racing. One of the many
reasons<n>Umamusume race is to meet the<n>expectations of
their adoring fans.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
Ah, my apologies... We've drifted<n>from our original
conversation.<n>Unfortunately, hearing about your<n>training
regimen has spoiled my plans.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
What's more... I have to admit, I have<n>concerns for your
future. Grave<n>concerns.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
You and Suzuka seek to boldly go<n>where no racer has gone
before. The<n>ideal you search for may even lie<n>beyond an
Umamusume's<n>capabilities.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: But when you cross that threshold,<n>her legs...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Agnes Tachyon trails off and she<n>averts her eyes. I take a
deep breath<n>before continuing with her apparent<n>
conclusion.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: You don't think her body can handle<n>it.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: You don't think her body can handle<n>it.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: I don't know. Whatever I say wouldbe nothing more than speculation. I'mnot even sure Umamusume have limits.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
After all, we are full of mysteries. I<n>apologize if my words
alarm you.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
In any case, I am looking forward to<n>seeing what kind of
running you and<n>Suzuka create... May it serve as a<n>shining
beacon for generations to<n>come.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Let's gooo! I'm off to do some ramp<n>training!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
I believe that's next on my schedule<n>too, followed by
running the<n>straightaways, correct?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: As always, Silence Suzuka is diligent<n>at practice.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Her regimen is nothing special, and<n>physically, she seems
like any other<n>Umamusume.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Yet that running of hers is unlike<n>anything I've seen
before... Just what<n>will happen if we continue down this<n>
path?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
You and Suzuka seek to boldly go<n>where no racer has gone
before. The<n>ideal you search for may even lie<n>beyond an
Umamusume's<n>capabilities.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Trainer?

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: Th-that's right! Ramp training, and<n>then straightaways.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: Th-that's right! Ramp training, and<n>then straightaways.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: All right, then I'll get started.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Her running style is something other<n>Umamusume only
dream about.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Nobody can run like that. Or at least,<n>nobody but Suzuka ever
has.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
(If we keep this up, she's going to go<n>beyond what should
be physically<n>possible.)

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
(If we keep this up, she's going to go<n>beyond what should
be physically<n>possible.)

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
As much as I don't want to think<n>about it, the thought of an
impending<n>disaster continues to plague my mind.
